participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Sociable and light-hearted, enjoys spending time in the kitchen and is passionate about cooking.
participant_1.background: i like to spend my money on cars. i have never had a steady relationship. i watch too much tv in spare time. i go to the gym most days just to socialize. i work from home.

participant_2.name: Sophia
participant_2.personality: Creative and thoughtful, strives to find beauty in everyday life and has a deep appreciation for art and culture.
participant_2.background: i am a descendant of christopher columbus. i am an art major in college. i love to cook paella. i have a weakness for fish and chips. i visit europe twice a year.
